list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a deposit of small white ice crystals formed on the ground or other surfaces when the temperature falls below freezing.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the lanes were glistening with frost
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Các làn đường đang lấp lánh với sương giá

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: cover (something) with or as if with small ice crystals; freeze.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: each windowpane was frosted along its edges
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Mỗi cửa sổ bị mờ dọc theo các cạnh của nó
